title: Klyppr
description:
Klyppr - a web-based video editing tool that automatically detects and removes silent parts from your videos. Perfect for content creators who want to make their videos more engaging!

Key highlights:

🎯 Browser-based: No software installation needed
🔇 Smart silence detection
✂️ Automatic trimming of quiet segments
🚀 Powered by FFmpeg.wasm for client-side processing
🔒 Privacy-focused: All processing happens in your browser
